properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Is input disabled. Passed directly to the input

properties.name: help
properties.description: Text for the tooltip at the bottom of the input

properties.name: name
properties.description: With this property current input listen event validateTest

properties.name: helpLabel
properties.description: Text for the tooltip label.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Icon name for icons from src/icons folder or an svg code

properties.name: iconRight
properties.description: Same with Icon property, but display icons at the left side

properties.name: label
properties.description: Label at the top of the input

properties.name: lang
properties.description: BCP 47 code. Language to be used in the datepicker for month names and weekday labels. Can be set globally with $root.locale. This property overrides global setting

properties.name: lg
properties.description: Large size - 464px

properties.name: md
properties.description: Medium size - 252px

properties.name: sm
properties.description: Small size -  144px

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: Passed directly to the input

properties.name: type
properties.description: Passed to the input with type_ computed property. <Input type="date" /> results in <input type="text" /.>

properties.name: validators
properties.description: Array of validator Objects. When multiple validators fail, only one error is displayed, determined by their order in the array. Each Object should have three fields:

subProperty.name: message
subProperty.description: Error message that shown when validation fails

subProperty.name: validator
subProperty.description: Function that takes input value as an argument and returns Boolean

properties.name: value
properties.description: Binds value property to input

properties.name: radioVal
properties.description: Property for type Radio. When the value of v-model is same as radioVal of the element, the element is selected.

properties.name: minDate
properties.description: Property for type Date. Earliest selectable day for the datepicker

properties.name: maxDate
properties.description: Property for type Date. Latest selectable day for the datepicker

properties.name: dateRangeStart
properties.description: Property for type Date. Point of reference for the dateRange property

properties.name: dateRange
properties.description: Property for type Date. An alternative to minDate/maxDate

properties.name: datepickerPosition
properties.description: Property for type Date. Forwarded to datepicker dropdown position.

properties.name: options
properties.description: Property for type Select. Array<Object>. Options for select. Each item is bound to an <option> element. Additionaly a .title property can be set to change the displayed value

properties.name: datepickerBorderColorDesktop
properties.description: Set border color for desktop datepicker

properties.name: slideLabel
properties.description: Set up slideble input label

properties.name: datePositionChangeable
properties.description: Set up changeable position of datepicker depend on device resolution

properties.name: showErrors
properties.description: Responsible for showing error message

properties.name: datepickerWrapperStyleObject
properties.description: Styles object responsible for styles which will be applied to datepicker wrapper

properties.name: datepickerFullWidth
properties.description: Responsible for full width of datepicker

properties.name: datepickerBackgroundColor
properties.description: Set background color of datepicker backdrop

properties.name: valueModeSelect
properties.description: Setup value by true, it'll provide next functionality for select component like make a possible to get only value at model from option object, and will allow setting option object by default only by value of it's option that came from model. Checking is value by type in process of finding option object

properties.name: iconPadding
properties.description: Set icon padding

properties.name: maxlength
properties.description: Setup max count characters for Input component with type text

properties.name: pattern
properties.description: Setup regexp object with allowed characters of field

properties.name: confirmModel
properties.description: Provided value for validation purpose like equality models of Input component and any other model

events.name: validation
events.description: Emitted when the input value changes.

events.name: validate
events.description: Listening event 'validate' for running validation even if this field was not touched.

events.name: validate{name}
events.description: Run field validation, for inputs which have current name property.

events.name: lastKeyDownDelay
events.description: Run after keyDown event with delay 300 milliseconds.

events.name: inputFocus
events.description: Triggered when the input field of Input Component will dispatch focus event

events.name: inputBlur
events.description: Triggered when the input field of Input Component will dispatch blur event
